scripts.knit:build:es6: NODE_ENV=production knit exec --parallel --scope unpublished --label 'Building ES6' -- babel . -d ROOT_DIR/dist/KNIT_MODULE_NAME/es6 --ignore tests,mocks
scripts.knit:build:cjs: NODE_ENV=production knit exec --parallel --scope unpublished --label 'Building CJS' -- babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-commonjs . -d ROOT_DIR/dist/KNIT_MODULE_NAME --ignore tests,mocks
scripts.knit:build:umd: NODE_ENV=production knit exec --parallel --scope unpublished --label 'Building UMD' -- rollup -c ROOT_DIR/rollup.config.js -i ROOT_DIR/dist/KNIT_MODULE_NAME/es6/index.js -o ROOT_DIR/dist/KNIT_MODULE_NAME/umd/index.min.js -n KNIT_MODULE_NAME
scripts.knit:build: run-s knit:clean knit:copy knit:build:es6 knit:build:cjs knit:build:umd knit:stitch
scripts.knit:publish: knit exec --label 'Publishing' --scope unpublished --working-dir dist -- npm publish --access public
scripts.version: knit exec --label 'Versioning' --scope modified -- npm version --no-git-tag-version $npm_package_version && git add .
